translation.es: - Sí, Tim lo hará.- Yo confío en ti.

translation.en: I hope you're worth the trouble. Lola Alvarez, give us all you've got.
translation.es: - Espero que valgas la pena.- Lola Alvarez, danos todo lo que tienes.

translation.en: If you pass muster at mustering, then we can talk wine.
translation.es: Si pasas esta prueba, hablaremos de vino.

translation.en: Deal.
Thank you.
[whispering] Yes.
Might as well get started then.
-Wait, like, right now? -No time like the present.
translation.es: - ¿Ahora?- No hay mejor momento que el presente.

translation.en: Well, I mean, Don't I need to drop my bag off at the cottage first?
translation.es: ¿No dejo mi bolso en la cabaña primero?

translation.en: Leave it. And no more cottage. Workers stay in the shearers' quarters.
translation.es: Déjalo. Y nada de cabaña.Dormirás con los esquiladores.

translation.en: Well, I… I mean, I can't just leave my bag here. What if it gets stolen?
translation.es: No puedo dejar mi bolso aquí.¿Si me lo roban?

translation.en: We're 200 kilometers away from anything.
Who's gonna steal it?
Wait. What? Uh…
[Max] Sheep pens. Shearing shed.
When you're running livestock, you wanna make sure they're safe,
translation.es: Debes asegurartede que el ganado esté bien.

translation.en: fed, you know, watered.
Keep up on diseases and pregnancies.
translation.es: Y estar al tantode las enfermedades y los embarazos.

translation.en: Sounds like things get pretty wild here on a Saturday night.
translation.es: Las cosas se ponen salvajeslos sábados por la noche.

translation.en: Yeah.
[Max] Uh, so, during the season, we shear about 500 sheep a day.
translation.es: Durante la temporada,esquilamos unas 500 ovejas por día.

translation.en: Ah. Okay. So that's where the action happens. Uh, yeah, nah.
translation.es: - Ahí está la acción.- Sí… No…

translation.en: You won't be doing any sheep work. That's for the experienced hands.
translation.es: No trabajarás con ovejas.Eso es para las manos expertas.

translation.en: Okay. So, what will I be doing?
Chores. Grunt work. Hard yakka.
Hey, you volunteered for it.
Not complaining. I love grunt work.
translation.es: No me quejo. Me encanta el trabajo duro.

translation.en: Whoo! Bring it on. That's good to hear.
We'll start you off with some fence mending.
We have kangaroos out here, constantly making holes.
translation.es: Aquí hay cangurosque hacen agujeros constantemente.

translation.en: Kangaroos? Like, boing-boing ones with pouches? Will I get to see some?
Yeah. That "boing-boing one" will kick you flat on your back.
translation.es: Esos saltarines pueden pateartey hacerte caer de espalda.

translation.en: What about koalas?
Uh, they scratch.
Huge claws, like this.
Oh. So disappointing. Do you have to burst every bubble?
translation.es: Qué decepcionante.¿Tienes que desengañarme de todo?

translation.en: -[engine sputtering] -[Max] Maybe.
[Max] Hey, don't-- Lazza, don't.
-Lazza, don't keep-- -[Lola] Oh. [chuckles]
[groaning] Lazza, don't quit on me here. Come on.
Busted radiator. Gotta walk back. Wait. Can't you call a tow truck?
translation.es: - Radiador roto. Regresaremos caminando.- ¿No puedes llamar a una grúa?

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, nah. There's no reception out here.
translation.es: Sí… No… Aquí no hay recepción.

translation.en: Oh, great. [scoffing] Station life is unpredictable.
translation.es: - Genial.- La vida aquí es impredecible.

translation.en: As they say, "If you jump in the saddle, be ready for the ride."
translation.es: Como dicen: "Si te subes a la silla,prepárate para cabalgar".

translation.en: -Was that a cowboy wisdom quote? -Stockman. No cowboys here.
translation.es: - ¿Un dicho de vaqueros?- Aquí no hay vaqueros.

translation.en: Then what's a jackaroo?
Well, it's technically a cowboy, but it's a term for newbies like you.
translation.es: Técnicamente, un vaquero,pero es un término para novatos como tú.

translation.en: -Are they all you got? -My ankle boots?
-Oh, I have sneakers too. -Oh, that's no good.
-Flip-flops? -It's rough land out here.
You'll need Blunnies to protect your feet. And you didn't even bring a hat.
translation.es: Necesitarás botas para los pies.Y ni siquiera trajiste un sombrero.

translation.en: It was kinda supposed to be a two-night stay.
translation.es: - Solo iba a quedarme dos noches.- Cierto.

translation.en: -Right. -You guys got a gift shop? [chuckling] That's very funny.
translation.es: - ¿Tienen tienda de regalos?- Qué graciosa. Toma.

translation.en: -Here. Take mine. [laughing] -Oh! No, no, no.
Okay. Oh, right.
Well, then, thank you. This is… This is fine. I'm fine.
[Max] Well, you won't be in an hour or so. Australian sun shows no mercy.
translation.es: No lo estarás en una hora.El sol australiano no tiene piedad.

translation.en: We'll start back training tomorrow.
translation.es: - Empezaremos a entrenar mañana.- Esto será divertido.

translation.en: [Lola] What?
[Max] Sixty days, huh?
-[Lola] To get my wine importer's license? -[Max] I pay attention.
translation.es: - ¿Para obtener la licencia de importador?- Presto atención.

translation.en: Yeah. There's no way Hazel's gonna go for a company that doesn't exist yet.
translation.es: Hazel nunca elegiráuna compañía que aún no existe.

translation.en: You do realize how absurd that is, right?
translation.es: ¿Te das cuenta de lo absurdo que es eso?

translation.en: Well, sometimes you have to take risks. Believe in yourself.
translation.es: A veces hay que arriesgar.Creer en uno mismo.

translation.en: You know, go big or go home.
Yeah. Well, good on ya. But I wouldn't get my hopes up.
translation.es: Sí, bueno, bien por ti.Pero yo no me haría ilusiones.

translation.en: Okay. Well, thank you for the encouragement.
I'm just being practical.
Practical isn't really my style.
Is it always so hot here?
Nah.
Gets heaps hotter in the arvo.
translation.es: Hace más calor en la arvo.

translation.en: -Arvo? -[Max] Means "afternoon."
[woman] Who's the one who lives in the van?
[woman 2] No. The blonde one from last Saturday.
translation.es: No, el rubio del sábado pasado.

translation.en: [woman 2] He's the only shaggable man within 200 kilometers.
translation.es: Es el único tipo atractivoen un radio de 200 kilómetros.

translation.en: [woman] This is why I'm glad I'm not single. Hi. Lola from L.A.
translation.es: - Me alegra no estar soltera.- Hola. Lola de Los Ángeles.

translation.en: Your new roomie. [chuckling]
Hi.
Oh, impromptu mobile office.
I got a Skype-date with Heidi. Yeah. Lockie hasn't messaged me back since Tuesday.
translation.es: - Tengo una cita por Skype con Heidi.- Lockie no me responde desde el martes.

translation.en: He's definitely ghosting me.
Ugh, men.
I'm Breeze. And don't worry about them.
translation.es: Soy Breeze. Y no te preocupes por ellas.

translation.en: Takes a while to earn their trust.
Oh. Yeah, I'm only here for two weeks. I'm not trying to steal their jobs, so…
translation.es: Solo me quedaré dos semanas.No intento robarles el trabajo.

translation.en: Reckon that airport van'll be back here in no time. Bet you ten bucks she doesn't last the week.
translation.es: - Pronto volverá al aeropuerto.- Te apuesto diez dólares a que no dura.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Deal. -[shower knob squeaks]
sitting right here. Just--
[man] Oh no! Somebody used all the hot water!
-What? Are you kidding? -Are you serious?
Sorry. It was a 14-hour flight. I really needed that long shower.
translation.es: Lo siento. Fue un vuelo de 14 horas.Necesitaba esa ducha larga.

translation.en: -[scoffing] -Heidi. Hi, baby.
Hey. How you going?
[woman 2] I'm good. Tired. You look amazing.
-[woman 2] No… -[woman] Oh, come on.
Well, that is just brilliant.
Sorry.
Chores don't do themselves, Big Smoke.
translation.es: Las tareas no se hacen solas, Citadina.

translation.en: [man] Here you go, Henry.
Today's riddle. Oh, not this again. Every damn morning.
translation.es: - El acertijo de hoy.- Otra vez no. Cada maldita mañana.

translation.en: Gotta keep you on your toes.
What ship has two mates but no captain?
translation.es: ¿Qué barco tiene dos marinerospero ningún capitán?

translation.en: -[woman] Like a canoe? -[Henry] Nah.
No, like a kayak with, like, two seats.
Oh, thank you.
-[woman] Titanic. -[Henry] That doesn't even make sense.
translation.es: - El Titanic.- Eso no tiene sentido.

translation.en: -[Lola groans] -[woman 2] A submarine?
Sorry, sir? Excuse me,
do you have any other coffee options, like a latte or an espresso?
translation.es: ¿Tiene otras opciones de café?¿Un latte o un expreso?

translation.en: You're joking. Right?
Okay. I can work with this. No worries.
translation.es: Bien. Esto está bien. No se preocupe.

translation.en: Oi, over here. We saved you a seat.
You guys are, uh, talking to me now?
Uh, well, Breeze was right. We can be a bit too hard on the newbies.
translation.es: Bueno, Breeze tenía razón.Somos muy duras con las novatas.

translation.en: Yeah. We were just pulling your leg last night, that's all.
translation.es: Anoche te tomábamos el pelo, es todo.

translation.en: Okay. [scoffing]
-Hi. -Hi. Morning.
Oh, don't. You two are terrible. Leave her alone, the poor thing.
translation.es: No. Ustedes dos son terribles.Déjenla en paz, pobrecita.

translation.en: -Best prank ever. -It never gets old. [laughing]
translation.es: - Es la mejor broma.- Nunca pasa de moda.

translation.en: Bit of a friendly hazing. Should've warned ya.
-We all get it on our first day. -Yeah. Female friendship is overrated.
translation.es: - Todos la sufrimos.- La amistad femenina está sobrevalorada.

translation.en: I got it! The riddle. A relationship.
Yeah. We have a winner.
[Henry] First prize, an extra snag from Danno here.
translation.es: El primer premio,una salchicha extra de Danno.

translation.en: -[woman] I'm getting it tonight. -Morning.
-[Henry] Hey, boss. -[all] Morning.
-You ready to get started? -Yeah, let's do it.
[Max] Right, so you bend this. Like that.
[Lola] Okay.
Feed this through here, right? Then you twist it. You twist that back.
translation.es: Lo pasas por aquí, ¿ves?Luego lo giras y lo vuelves a girar.

translation.en: Then you twist that back through there, and then you… Right, okay.
translation.es: Luego lo giras por ahí y… Bien.

translation.en: -Like that. See? -[Lola] Yeah.
-So you hold this and pull down. -[Lola] Uh-huh.
translation.es: Sostienes esto y jalas hacia abajo.

translation.en: -And that's it. Done. -Oh.
Show me again.
-Seriously? -Just-- Last time, I swear.
translation.es: - ¿En serio?- La última vez, te lo juro.

translation.en: This is the one.
A week ago, I was pouring a Cabernet for the sommelier at the Ritz-Carlton.
translation.es: Hace una semana, le servía un cabernetal sumiller del Ritz-Carlton.

translation.en: And now, I'm pouring sheep food. What happened?
translation.es: Ahora sirvo comida de oveja. ¿Qué pasó?

translation.en: Oh. Hey, girl. Somebody looks hungry. You ready to eat?
[Lola] Okay, then.
You got it easy, sister. Waited on hand and hoof.
translation.es: Lo tienes fácil, hermana.Esperas al pie del comedero.

translation.en: Bon appétit, whoever you are.
Wait. Who are you? You need a name.
Come on.
Oh! No, no, no, no! Stop. Stop it. Don't do that!
Just spitballing here. Uh, Meryl Sheep?
Just-- That's it! Don't--
Uh, Calista Flockhart?
-Yup. Good boy. -[sheep bleating] Okay.
-Hey. You're mixing up the mob. -What?
You see the different colored tags here?
You better get to re-sorting the sheep. They're not gonna sort themselves.
translation.es: Tendrás que reordenarlas.No se ordenarán solas.

translation.en: Yeah, okay. All right. Listen up, guys, okay? No mingling.
translation.es: Está bien. Bien, escuchen. No se mezclen.

translation.en: Hey! Hello? Hello?
Pay attention. No, no, no.
Wait, hey, do you have wool in your ears? What the flock.
translation.es: ¿Tienen lana en las orejas? Qué hatajo.

translation.en: No. I've got it.
You are a grand dame.
A diva.
You are Baaabra Streisand.
I like you.
Move it. Move… Thank you.
Stay. Stay. Okay.
Wait, no.
Okay.
cool.
Your boots are amazing. [chuckling] I should've consulted you before I packed.
translation.es: Tus botas son hermosas.Debí consultarte antes de empacar.

translation.en: -Um, speaking of… -[Hazel] Mm-hmm. …on the plane I read in Wine Spectator that you like unique wines.
translation.es: Hablando de eso, leí en Wine Spectatorque te gustan los vinos únicos.

translation.en: And there's this all-female collective out of Uruguay doing amazing stuff.
translation.es: Hay una cooperativa de mujeresen Uruguay que hace cosas increíbles.

translation.en: I could, uh… I could arrange for them to send you some bottles.
translation.es: Podría hacerque te envíen algunas botellas.

translation.en: I'm busy with station work.
You should be too.
-[Lola] Why is this so hard? -[Max] Yeah. Well, station life is tough.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué es tan difícil?- La vida en la quinta es dura.

translation.en: Can't wine and dine your way out of problems. Oh, that's what you think I do all day?
translation.es: - No todo se arregla con vino y comida.- ¿Crees que hago eso todo el día?

translation.en: Well, isn't it?
Well, technically, yes. -Huh. -[Lola] But I'm a self-starter.
Number one at Girl Scout cookie sales three years in a row.
translation.es: La mejor vendedora de galletasde Girl Scouts tres años seguidos.

translation.en: High school valedictorian.
Nailed my sommelier exam at age 22, which is basically unheard of.
translation.es: Me gradué de sumiller a los 22 años,lo cual es inaudito.

translation.en: And I do the New York Times crossword puzzle in ink.
translation.es: Y hago el crucigramadel New York Times con tinta.

translation.en: I do not fail. I've got this.
Well, a stubborn horse walks ahead of the herd.
translation.es: Un caballo terco va delante de la manada.

translation.en: Where do you get these quotes? Pinterest?
-Hey, hey! Stop! Stop! -No. I'll fix it.
I just need to get the plow!
-Brown snake! It's a brown snake. -[tense music playing]
Extremely deadly.
Okay.
[Max] Oh, you leave 'em be, they'll leave you be.
translation.es: Si la dejas en paz, te dejará en paz.

translation.en: Getting closer and closer.
-Can you believe it? -[woman] Yeah, can't wait.
I'm so excited.
Love you, Heidi. Take care of our bean. [Heidi] Love you too.
translation.es: - Te amo, Heidi. Cuida nuestro frijol.- Yo también te amo.

translation.en: Sam's partner Heidi is up the duff. Like Hilary?
translation.es: - La pareja de Sam, Heidi, está encinta.- ¿Qué cinta?

translation.en: Like pregnant. Due next month.
Ah. What? Congratulations. [Sam] Yeah.
-Campfire time. Oi. -[people laughing]
-Hmm? Yes. -[Sam] Let's get some coldies.
-Breeze. -Yeah, coming.
Oi, newbie. I noticed the dunny's looking pretty scungy. So…
translation.es: Novata. Noté que el aseoestá un poco sucio, así que…

translation.en: Sorry, I should've warned ya, again. Newest jillaroo gets toilet-cleaning duty.
translation.es: Lo siento. Debí advertirte. Otra vez.La ovejera nueva limpia el baño.

translation.en: And so, we repurpose sheep manure into fertilizer.
It's all part of keeping Waratah green.
translation.es: Todo para mantener a Waratah verde.

translation.en: Okay. The, uh, eco-friendly aspect of this farm got a lot less appealing.
translation.es: El aspecto ecológico de esta granjase volvió mucho menos atractivo.

translation.en: Yeah. So shovel that into the spreader.
translation.es: Sí. Ahora pon eso en el esparcidor.

translation.en: We're gonna need 20 loads today. Twen--? Oh… Yeah.
Oh, that was terrible.
Nope, nothing. Okay.
[Hazel] How's it going with the American?
Uh, she has spirit, I'll say that.
Translation, she's useless?
Well, uh…
Hi there. Hi. Here I am. Hard at work. Whoa!
Oh no, no, no, no, no, no.
No, no, no.
I, uh… I saw this whole thing going differently.
translation.es: Me imaginaba todo esto de otra manera.

translation.en: Haze, you all right? Wait, no. Wait, I'm sorry.
translation.es: - Haze, ¿estás bien?- Espera, no. Lo siento.

translation.en: Uh, wait, wait. No, I'm sorry.
Where are you going in such a rush? L.A. Tell Sam she won the bet.
translation.es: - ¿Adónde vas con tanta prisa?- A casa. Dile a Sam que ganó la apuesta.

translation.en: -[Lola straining] -Come on, Lola. Don't go. It's been five days. It took me months to find my groove here.
translation.es: No te vayas. Pasaron cinco días.Me tomó meses encontrar mi lugar aquí.

translation.en: I don't have months. This was always a pipe dream.
translation.es: No tengo meses.Esto siempre fue un sueño imposible.

translation.en: There's no way I am recovering from today.
translation.es: No hay formade que me recupere de lo de hoy.

translation.en: Any tips on how to hail a taxi? Nah, they take forever and cost a fortune.
translation.es: - ¿Sabes dónde conseguir un taxi?- No, tardan mucho y cuestan una fortuna.

translation.en: [inhales deeply] Max is heading into town though. Yay.
translation.es: - Max se dirige a la ciudad.- Qué bien.

translation.en: Hey, Arlo.
Can I hitch a ride?
Yep.
[Max] Ugh. Lazza, you rotten old bastard.
[Lola sighing] Seriously? Again?
[Max sighing] I'll motorbike back from the station with tools. Let's go.
translation.es: Traeré herramientas de la quintaen la moto. Vamos.

translation.en: -[Max] Arlo! Come here. -[Lola] Dressed for success, as always.
translation.es: - ¡Arlo! Ven aquí.- Vestida para el éxito, como siempre.

translation.en: You know what? I think this is a sign. Australia hates me!
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué?Creo que es una señal. ¡Australia me odia!

translation.en: Hate's a pretty strong word.
translation.es: Odio es una palabra muy fuerte.

translation.en: You know, I've never quit anything. Ever.
Never mind bold and crazy, I went too big and now I'm going home.
translation.es: No importa la audacia y la locura.Arriesgué mucho y ahora me voy a casa.

translation.en: Hey, where's that spitfire who blew in, determined to do business with the Hazel Vaughn, huh?
translation.es: ¿Dónde está la chica audaz que vinoa hacer negocios con Hazel Vaughn?

translation.en: She was gutsy.
[in Australian accent] Time for her to pack it in, mate.
translation.es: Es hora de que se largue, amigo.

translation.en: [Max chuckling] I don't know.
It's not every day a Fortune 500 CEO gets sheep dung sprayed all over 'em.
translation.es: A una directora ejecutiva de Fortune 500no le rocían estiércol muy seguido.

translation.en: That really cracked me up. [scoffing] Well, I'm glad that I could amuse you.
translation.es: - Eso me hizo reír mucho.- Me alegra poder divertirte.

translation.en: Wait a second. Was that a smile just then?
translation.es: Espera un segundo. ¿Eso fue una sonrisa?

translation.en: Oh, come on. You're halfway there.
No. I see what you're doing and I will not fall for it, pal. Okay?
translation.es: No. Veo lo que hacesy no caeré en la trampa.

translation.en: -Let me wallow in self-pity. -See, now you're talking.
You just gotta get one side of your mouth up and then the other side--
translation.es: Tienes que levantarun lado de la boca, luego el otro…

translation.en: -And then you got a full smile. -Stop. Stop! You are a horrible man.
translation.es: - Basta.- Y sonríes. Eres muy malo.

translation.en: I know. I know. It's one of my better qualities.
translation.es: Lo sé. Es una de mis mejores cualidades.

translation.en: I, uh, heard you talking to Hazel before.
You were about to agree with her that I am useless.
translation.es: Estabas por decirle que soy una inútil.

translation.en: Uh, I was about to tell Hazel that you have promise.
translation.es: Estaba por decirle que tienes potencial.

translation.en: Because you do.
You know, when it comes to the hard work,
translation.es: Cuando se trata de trabajo duro,

translation.en: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses,
translation.es: algunos se arremangan, otros se niegan

translation.en: and some don't turn up at all.
translation.es: y otros ni siquiera se presentan.

translation.en: You really do have a thing for inspirational quotes, don't you?
You turned up, Lola, and you didn't turn up your nose.
translation.es: Lola, tú te presentastey no te negaste a nada.

translation.en: That's worth a lot in my book. And Hazel's too.
translation.es: Eso vale mucho para mí.Y para Hazel también.

translation.en: Wait. You told me not to get my hopes up when it comes to Hazel.
translation.es: Espera. Me dijisteque no me hiciera ilusiones con Hazel.

translation.en: I dunno. Maybe…
Maybe you're onto something about taking risks.
translation.es: Quizá tengas razón con lo de arriesgar.

translation.en: Look, it's not like you'll make your flight now,
translation.es: Mira, ya no llegarás a tu vuelo.

translation.en: -so just think on it overnight. -[sighs]
[Lola scoffing] Okay, what now?
[Max] Uh, nothing. I'm just curious.
Why wine?
My, uh… My dad worked his butt off to support the two of us.
translation.es: Mi papá trabajó duropara mantenernos a los dos.

translation.en: He went from selling insurance door-to-door to setting up his own shop.
translation.es: Pasó de vender seguros puerta a puertaa montar su propia tienda.

translation.en: He was the OG badass.
My mom was never really in the picture,
so, you know, my dad's my hero and role model,
translation.es: Mi papá es mi héroe y modelo,

translation.en: and I just figured I'd follow him into the insurance biz.
translation.es: y pensé en seguirloen el negocio de los seguros.

translation.en: And then, in college, I was, um,
translation.es: Luego, en la universidad, fui mesera en un restaurante exclusivode Los Ángeles.

translation.en: I was waitressing at this upscale L.A. steakhouse,
translation.es: fui mesera en un restaurante exclusivode Los Ángeles.

translation.en: and… and one night the Wine Captain didn't show up for his shift.
translation.es: Una noche,el Capitán del Vino no se presentó.

translation.en: So, I winged it and nailed it.
translation.es: Así que probé hacer su trabajoy lo hice muy bien.

translation.en: I… I had a knack for telling a wine's story.
translation.es: Era muy buenacontando la historia de un vino.

translation.en: The magical places it'll take you.
translation.es: Era muy buenacontando la historia de un vino. Los lugares mágicos a los que te llevará.

translation.en: I'd found my thing.
That's a good feeling to have.
-I think he agrees. -Yeah, he likes that.
translation.es: - Creo que está de acuerdo.- Sí, le gusta.

translation.en: ♪ And she woke up In a cold sweat on the floor ♪
♪ Next to a family portrait Drawn when you were four ♪
translation.es: EN LA QUINTA WARATAHEL JARDÍN DEL EDÉN DE SYBYLLA

translation.en: -[women groaning] -[Lola] Having a, uh, lie-in, ladies? Hmm?
I, uh, fixed the hot water issue. My dad's house has a tricky boiler too.
translation.es: Arreglé el problema del agua caliente.La caldera es como la de mi padre.

translation.en: Dibs on the first shower. [gasping] You go, girl.
translation.es: Pido bañarme primera. Bien hecho, amiga.

translation.en: I reckon we're about the same size.
translation.es: Creo que usamos el mismo talle.

translation.en: Yeah, and I've got a spare pair of Blunnies too, so…
translation.es: Y yo tengo unas botas extra. Toma.

translation.en: Thanks, but why?
You proved us wrong, mate. I lost the bet.
[chuckling] Welcome to the crew.
translation.es: Bienvenida al equipo.Gracias por hacerme ganar dinero.

translation.en: And thanks for putting a tenner in my pocket, making Kylie a loser.
translation.es: Bienvenida al equipo.Gracias por hacerme ganar dinero. - Y hacer de Kylie una perdedora.- Sí.

translation.en: Yes, yes.
translation.es: - Y hacer de Kylie una perdedora.- Sí.

translation.en: Anyway, the shoes are a loan, so I expect them back and in perfect condition too.
translation.es: Las botas son un préstamo.Me las devolverás en perfecto estado.

translation.en: You got it.
They charge six dollars for this in L.A. It's called a pour-over.
translation.es: Sale seis dólares en Los Ángeles.Se llama método de vertido.

translation.en: -Six bucks? -[Lola] Mm-hmm. I gotta get a new job.
-Newsflash. -[Max] Mm-hmm. I'm staying.

just grapes.

in vino veritas? Boozy truth?

there's something I need to tell you.

Morning, boss cocky.

Great-great grandson of Sybylla Vaughn.
Hazel Vaughn's younger brother.

When Mum died, Hazel and I inherited Waratah.

translation.en: All right? I turned it into a profitable station

translation.es: mientras Hazey iba a la universidad,e invertí en su primera compañía.

translation.en: The same person that you kissed last night.

Okay.
[Hazel] That is a great idea.
[Calder] We'll make it happen.
[Hazel] That's good.

and I'll have my Sydney office draw up the contracts.
Sounds great.
Right, Lola?

You have a unique opportunity here

translation.en: -Go ahead. I'll be right there. -[Calder] Okay.
You're doing the wrong thing, Haze.
I saw Lola at the winery yesterday. She's the person for the job.
translation.es: Vi a Lola en la bodega.Ella es la persona indicada.

translation.en: Well, now you suddenly care about Vaughn Family Wines?
Wild guess, you decided to tell Lola who you are, and it was too late and blew up in your face.
translation.es: Ya sé, le dijiste a Lola quién eres,fue demasiado tarde y todo terminó mal.

translation.en: Hate to say it, Brother, you should've stepped up sooner.
translation.es: Odio decirlo, hermano,debiste haber intervenido antes.

translation.en: In work and in love.
translation.es: En el trabajo y en el amor.

translation.en: Are you insane? You walked away from everything you always wanted.
translation.es: ¿Estás loca?Es todo lo que siempre quisiste.

translation.en: You know, I've learned a lot about myself in Australia.
translation.es: Aprendí mucho sobre mí en Australia.

translation.en: One is, I don't like Vegemite,
translation.es: Que no me gusta el Vegemite,

translation.en: but more importantly, I was right when I quit Mythos.
translation.es: pero lo más importantees que hice bien en renunciar.

translation.en: Life is too short for the Calders of the world.
translation.es: La vida es muy cortapara soportar a tipos como Calder.

translation.en: You know, I… [shuddered breathing]
I… I panicked. I… I'm sorry, I was desperate.
translation.es: Mira, entré en pánico. Lo siento, estaba desesperada.

translation.en: I'm… I am a horrible person.
Look, I get it. Okay?
You made a bad decision because you were in a tough spot with Calder.
translation.es: Tomaste una mala decisiónen una situación difícil.

translation.en: There were tons of times when I felt the same way.
-Really? So you understand? Yeah, but it was not your finest moment.
translation.es: - ¿En serio? ¿Entiendes?- Pero no fue tu mejor momento.

translation.en: -Oh, no, no, I know I'm like… Oh my God. -Let's be real.
translation.es: - No, lo sé… Dios mío.- Seamos realistas.

translation.en: I really know that. I'm so… I'm really… I'm so sorry.
translation.es: Lo sé. Lo siento mucho, de verdad.

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Audra] I'm so…
I'm so sorry.
So, do you think that we could be, like, friends again?
translation.es: ¿Crees que podríamos volver a ser amigas?

translation.en: -Yeah, nah. Don't get ahead of yourself. -No, yeah. Yeah. You're right.
translation.es: - Sí… No… No te apresures.- Sí. Tienes razón.

translation.en: Hey, it's okay to overdress for an occasion.
translation.es: Está bien vestirse muy bienpara una ocasión especial.

translation.en: Never apologize for style.
translation.es: Nunca te disculpes por tener estilo.

translation.en: You take care, you hear?
[whispering] Good girl.
[all] ♪ We stole the champagne We stole the champagne ♪
Here. Guess what we stole when Danno was out on smoko?
translation.es: Toma. Adivina qué robamoscuando Danno salió a fumar.

translation.en: -Champagne? -[all] Bubbles!
'Cause guess who's now head stockwoman? What? Oh! Congrats, girl! [grunts]
Thank you.
We're also celebrating that Kylie got bumped up to wool classer.
translation.es: Y a Kylie la ascendieron,ahora clasificará lana.

translation.en: -No biggie. No biggie. Thank you. -What? Amazing.
Well, that means that the team actually needs a new roustabout. If only we knew someone.
translation.es: El equipo necesita una nueva jornalera.Ojalá conociéramos a alguien.

translation.en: Mm. Thanks, ladies, but you know what? Day-drinking for my living is much, much easier.
translation.es: Gracias, pero ¿saben qué?Beber para ganarse la vida es más fácil.

translation.en: -Fair. -All good.
We heard that wine thing didn't work out exactly the way you planned.
translation.es: Oímos que lo del vinono salió como lo planeaste.

translation.en: Yeah. You know, you win some, you lose some.
translation.es: Sí, a veces se gana y otras se pierde.

translation.en: [gasping] Before I forget.
-Returning the loaners. -Thank you.
-Aw. Perfect condition. -For you.
How did you do that? I, um… I cleaned them.
-That checks out, yeah. -Right. Yeah.
[Sam] Yeah.
One more thing.
-[gasping] Ooh, ooh. What is this? -Oh. Okay.
-Open it. -What is it?
It's a… it's a FLATOUTbear.
I've never really heard of them, but it's… it's a thing here.
translation.es: No los conocía, pero son típicos de aquí.

translation.en: Yeah.
And I love it.
My, uh… My dad's my best friend.
translation.es: Mi papá es mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: He's got a lot of opinions about a lot of things, but I love it.
translation.es: Tiene muchas opiniones sobre todo,pero me encanta.

translation.en: And, um… and I know you're gonna be amazing too, so…
translation.es: Y sé que tú también lo harás increíble.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[Lola] Yeah.
-I'm gonna… -Go.
-We'll see you later. Yup, see ya. -Yeah.
So, all that to just…
To walk away?
Staying true to myself.
I'll figure it out. [inhales deeply]
Sybylla Vaughn didn't give up, and neither do I.
translation.es: Sybylla Vaughn no se rindió, yo tampoco.

translation.en: Look, about us, I just-- There is no us. Okay?
translation.es: - Sobre nosotros…- No hay un nosotros.

translation.en: I'm a Yank career gal heading home to the big smoke
translation.es: Soy una yanquique regresa a la gran ciudad

translation.en: and you're here doing your undercover boss thing.
translation.es: y tú vives aquíhaciendo de jefe encubierto.

translation.en: It would… It would never work.
And for the record,
I never cared what your last name was.
I never even asked.
No, uh, parting words of wisdom?
Nah.
I got nothing.
Goodbye, Max Vaughn.
Goodbye, Lola Alvarez.
Why doesn't your company buy its own darn coffee machine?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tu empresano compra su propia máquina de café?

translation.en: Oh please, Dad, you love being unofficial officer manager.
translation.es: Por favor, papá,te encanta ser el gerente no oficial.

translation.en: -Hmm. Use a coaster. -Okay.
-Refill, Audra? -Oh. Yes, please.
You know, when you rented that nice apartment, Lola,
I was hoping to turn this into a yoga studio.
translation.es: esperaba convertir estoen un estudio de yoga.

translation.en: Dad, when have you ever done yoga?
Uh, I was voted most flexible Latino in high school.
translation.es: Me votaron como el latinomás flexible de la secundaria.

translation.en: I still got some tricks.
-Wow. -Namaste.
I wonder if, um, Hazel's gonna end up going with the Sybylla wine label.
translation.es: Me pregunto si Hazelusará la etiqueta de vino de Sybylla.

translation.en: Yeah. Like, speaking of,
it's all over the wine trade websites.
translation.es: está en todas las páginasde venta de vinos.

translation.en: Mythos and Vaughn Family Wines have parted ways.
translation.es: Mythos ya no trabaja con Vaughn.

translation.en: -Wow. -[Audra] Yeah.
That was quick.
[Audra] Yeah. Like, still in the contractual grace period, apparently.
translation.es: Sí, parece que sigueen período de gracia contractual.

translation.en: Um, the official reason is they had, like, different working styles,
translation.es: La razón oficial esque tenían diferentes estilos de trabajo,

translation.en: but you know. I mean, AKA, they got to know Calder better, right?
translation.es: pero ya sabes,conocieron mejor a Calder, ¿no?

translation.en: So, like, should… should we go after Vaughn Wines?
I mean, it was your idea.
Let's focus on new business. Have you even tried calling Max?
translation.es: - Concentrémonos en cosas nuevas.- ¿Intentaste hablar con Max?

translation.en: Look, it took me a while to figure this out,
translation.es: Me tomó un tiempo darme cuenta de esto,

translation.en: but it's not even that he lied, you know? I…
translation.es: pero ni siquiera es porque mintió.

translation.en: I don't know. I just… I don't think he knows who he is yet.
translation.es: No lo sé. Creo que aún no sabe quién es.

translation.en: Sure, but what if his way to change that was to share it
translation.es: Sí, pero ¿y si su forma de cambiar eso era compartiéndolo con alguienen quien confiaba, y esa eras tú?

translation.en: with someone he really trusted, and that was you?
translation.es: era compartiéndolo con alguienen quien confiaba, y esa eras tú?

translation.en: So when did you get so wise?
Since you gave me a second chance.
translation.es: Desde que me diste otra oportunidad.

translation.en: You see the best in people, Lola. Even when they don't deserve it.
translation.es: Ves lo mejor de la gente, Lola.Incluso cuando no lo merecen.

translation.en: You believing in them makes them want to be that best version.
translation.es: Que creas en elloshace que quieran ser su mejor versión.

translation.en: Yeah.
I just, uh…
When we said goodbye, he didn't step up for me.
translation.es: Cuando nos despedimos,no hizo nada para que me quedara.

translation.en: So, in Max's Pinterest wisdom,
translation.es: Según la sabiduría de Pinterest de Max,

translation.en: the horse is already out of the barn.
translation.es: el caballo ya se fue del granero.

translation.en: Well, actually, Uruguay is a rising star in the wine world.
translation.es: El vino uruguayoes una estrella en ascenso.

translation.en: Its mild maritime climate is ideal for grape growing.
translation.es: Su clima templadoes ideal para el cultivo de la uva.

translation.en: And the women of the wine collective we're representing
translation.es: Y las mujeresde la cooperativa que representamos

translation.en: are known for their red varietals. Even their award-winning Tent Flint.
translation.es: son conocidas por sus vinos tintos,como su galardonado Tent Flint.

translation.en: Give it a taste.
[woman] Mm.
You know, we're starting to stock more niche wines. I love your product.
translation.es: Queremos más vinos de nicho.Me encanta tu producto.

translation.en: -[Lola] Great. Of course. -And I would love your card.
translation.es: - Me encantaría tener tu tarjeta.- Claro. Toma.

translation.en: -[Lola] For you. Thank you so much. -Thank you. This feels so good.
translation.es: - Me encantaría tener tu tarjeta.- Claro. Toma. - Gracias.- Tengo un buen presentimiento.

translation.en: -[Hamish] Lola. -Yeah.
Hamish! Hi!
Tasteful, but, uh, limited offerings. When are you gonna expand your list?
translation.es: De buen gusto, pero poca oferta.¿Cuándo vas a expandir tu lista?

translation.en: Oh, Hamish. You know I'm working on it.
I don't know. I gave you a good lead and you blew it, spectacularly.
translation.es: No sé. Te di un buen datoy lo arruinaste a lo grande.

translation.en: [Max chuckling] Nah, mate.
I'm the one who blew it.
What… What are you doing here?
I'm not a silent partner anymore.
translation.es: Ya no soy el socio silencioso.

translation.en: The reaction to the new label is through the roof.
translation.es: A todos les encantó la nueva etiqueta.

translation.en: Salud Imports is exactly what Vaughn Family Wines needs.
translation.es: Vaughn, Vinos de Familianecesita a Salud Importaciones.

translation.en: [Audra] She accepts. We're your new importer.
translation.es: Ella acepta. Somos tu nuevo importador.

translation.en: [laughing] Okay.
And I'm not just here on business.
translation.es: Y no estoy aquí solo por negocios.

translation.en: Baaabra misses you.
Sadly, it's true. She mopes all around her pen all day.
translation.es: Por desgracia, es cierto.Está muy triste en su corral.

translation.en: And she won't even wear her scarf anymore. She's miserable.
translation.es: Ni siquiera usa su pañuelo. Está abatida.

translation.en: So you came all this way to give me an update on Baaabra?
I came all this way to say I'm done hiding out.
translation.es: Vine para decirte que ya no me escondo.

translation.en: You never gave up, Lola.
But somewhere along the way,
I did.
I was a fool to let you go.
translation.es: Fui un tonto al dejarte ir.

translation.en: So here I am.
Go big or go home. Right?
Shut up and kiss me already.
I now pronounce you wife and wife.
translation.es: Ahora las declaro mujer y mujer.

translation.en: -[woman] Whoo-hoo! -Share a kiss.
It's time to celebrate, everyone!
-Look at you go. -Right?
-That was very good. -Thank you. Thank you.
I think Sybylla would love knowing that her story didn't end with her.
translation.es: Creo que a Sybylla le encantaría saberque su historia no terminó con ella.

translation.en: Waratah Station's never short on one thing,
translation.es: A la quinta Waratahnunca le falta una cosa:

translation.en: happy endings.
